Name: Creepy Races
About the game: Drive a vintage car down sinister roads while break pumpkins In Creepy Races you drive a car through narrow roads full of curves and obstacles while you break as many pumpkins as you can. Do not be fooled by the cute handpainted graphics and be careful that getting five stars in all the circuits is not within reach of anyone. Game Modes Score attack The maps have a duration between 1 and 3 minutes You have a button that replaces you at the last checkpoint to repeat that section and get better result The final score is based on time, the number of run down pumpkins, and the checkpoints you have repeated Driving 95% Platforms 5% Length: 18 Races Replay Value: High Complexity: High Art composition Own art 4% Unreal Markeplace Asset 96%
